short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use our highlighter to easily save cards into Supermind.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Supermind Highlighter gives the ability to create a card from any page. When any text is highlighted, the highlighter will open a popup allowing you to format into a question and answer, and save as a card.
